com.cmput301.w19t06.theundesirablejackals.book

Class BookRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.w19t06.theundesirablejackals.book.BookRequest

  • public class BookRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class mainly handles the book exchange between two users. It tracks the current situation of the book request through the use of BookStatus enum.
    See Also:
    Book, User, Geolocation

      • setBookRequestLendKey

        public void setBookRequestLendKey(java.lang.String bookRequestLendKey)

      • denyRequest

        public void denyRequest()
        Owner of the book has denied the borrowers request. This will also be called to deny all other book requests when a book request has been accepted for a user

      • acceptRequest

        public void acceptRequest()
        Owner has accepted the book request, which denies all other book requests

      • getBorrower

        public UserInformation getBorrower()

      • setBorrower

        public void setBorrower(UserInformation userInformation)

      • handOffBook

        public void handOffBook()
        Book has been handed off by the owner and yet to be received by the accepted borrower. This is done when the owner scans an accepted book request for hand off.

      • receiveBookAsOwner

        public void receiveBookAsOwner()
        Book has been has been returned to the owner. This is done by scanning a book that has a RETURNING book request status

      • returnBook

        public void returnBook()
        A borrowers action which returns the book to the owner and changes the book request status to RETURNING. This is done when the borrower scans the book for return

      • recieveBookAsBorrower

        public void recieveBookAsBorrower()
        Book has been has been received by the borrower which will change the book request status to Borrowed. This is done when a borrower scans a book with the HANDED_OFF book request status

      • getBookRequested

        public BookInformation getBookRequested()
        Returns:
        the book requested in this book request

      • getCurrentStatus

        public BookRequestStatus getCurrentStatus()
        Returns:
        returns the current status of the book request
